title: The Ultimate Fighter
resume: The Ultimate Fighter is a reality television series and mixed martial arts (MMA) competition, originating from the United States. On this show, professional MMA fighters that have yet to make a big name for themselves are situated in a house outside of Las Vegas, Nevada and compete against each other for the title of The Ultimate Fighter and a six-figure contract with the UFC.
